titleStmt.title: Epistolæ Ho-elianæ familiar letters domestic and forren divided into sundry sections, partly historicall, politicall, philosophicall, vpon emergent occasions / by James Howell.
Correspondence
titleStmt.author: Howell, James, 1594?-1666.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, enlarged with divers supplements, and the dates annexed which were wanting in the first : with an addition of a third volume of new letters.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W.H. for Humphrey Mosely ...,

notesStmt.note: Added t.p. on p. [257]: A new volume of familiar letters, partly philosophicall, politicall, historicall. The second edition, with additions.
Added t.p. on p. [9] in third grouping: Additionall letters of a fresher date, never publish'd before.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
